snippet.title: Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days - Official Trailer | Ghouls 4 Games
snippet.description: Here's a fresh look at gameplay from Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days in this new for the upcoming side-scrolling shelter survival game. Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days tasks you with guiding a desperate group of zombie apocalypse survivors to safety. Craft weapons, scavenge resources, balance your group’s needs, and try to get everyone out of danger alive. Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days will be available on PC.
